plot: A straight-laced deputy and an outlaw vampire must decide whether to follow their desire to kill each other or obey the law, as they team up to kill a group of bandit vampires traveling to town by train.
title: Somewhere in the Middle
plot_es: A straight-laced deputy and an outlaw vampire must decide whether to follow their desire to kill each other or obey the law, as they team up to kill a group of bandit vampires traveling to town by train.
plot_en: A straight-laced deputy and an outlaw vampire must decide whether to follow their desire to kill each other or obey the law, as they team up to kill a group of bandit vampires traveling to town by train.
